description: Try our easy to follow Caramelised Onion recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sauce & condiment,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Caramelised Onion Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat butter and olive oil in a large deep frying pan over medium heat. When butter has melted add brown onions, a pinch of salt and cook, stirring occasionally, for 20-25 minutes or until onions turn a rich golden colour.
Add brown sugar and vinegar. Stir until well combined and cook for 2 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer to a serving bowl
